LanguageData.T_HerbI.label: Herb I
LanguageData.T_HerbI.description: Learning to grow herb and to build Herb Field.
LanguageData.T_SaltI.label: Modern Salt Produce
LanguageData.T_SaltI.description: Learn basic methods to produce salt.
LanguageData.T_SaltII.label: Future Salt Produce
LanguageData.T_SaltII.description: Learn more advanced methods to produce salt.
LanguageData.T_Agriculture.label: Basic Agriculture
LanguageData.T_Agriculture.description: Learn the basics of agriculture on this new world. Allows the growing of Proso millet.
LanguageData.T_FieldI.label: Basic Soil
LanguageData.T_FieldII.label: Advanced Field
LanguageData.T_GrainI.label: Grain Research I
LanguageData.T_GrainI.description: Allows the growing of some basic forms of grain, such as Foxtail millet and Sorghum.
LanguageData.T_GrainII.label: Grain Research II
LanguageData.T_GrainII.description: Further advancements in agriculture enables your colony to grow new forms of grain, such as barley and potato.
LanguageData.T_GrainIII.label: Grain Research III
LanguageData.T_GrainIII.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colony the ability to grow new grain, such as rice, corn and wheat.
LanguageData.T_FruitI.label: Fruit Research I
LanguageData.T_FruitI.description: Allows the growing of some basic forms of Fruit, such as Peach and Grape.
LanguageData.T_FruitII.label: Fruit Research II
LanguageData.T_FruitII.description: Further advancements in agriculture enables the ability for your colonists to grow new Fruit, such as Orange and Olive.
LanguageData.T_FruitIII.label: Fruit Research III
LanguageData.T_FruitIII.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new Fruit, such as Apple, Strawberry and Melon.
LanguageData.T_VegetableI.label: Vegetable Research I
LanguageData.T_VegetableI.description: Allows the growing of some basic Vegetables, such as Radish and mugwort.
LanguageData.T_VegetableII.label: Vegetable Research II
LanguageData.T_VegetableII.description: Further advancements in agriculture enables the ability for your colonists to grow new Vegetables, such as Cabbage and lettuce.
LanguageData.T_VegetableIII.label: Vegetable Research III
LanguageData.T_VegetableIII.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new Vegetables, such as Carrot, Sweetpepper and Pumpkin.
LanguageData.T_SpiceI.label: Spice Research I
LanguageData.T_SpiceI.description: Allows the growing of basic Spice, such as Cinnamon.
LanguageData.T_SpiceII.label: Spice Research II
LanguageData.T_SpiceII.description: Further advancements in agriculture enables your colony to grow a new form of Spice, Pepper.
LanguageData.T_SpiceIII.label: Spice Research III
LanguageData.T_SpiceIII.description: Even further advancements in agriculture enables your colony to grow a new form of Spice, Black Pepper.
LanguageData.T_FlowerI.label: Flower research I
LanguageData.T_FlowerI.description: Learn to grow red flowers for honey.
LanguageData.T_FlowerII.label: Flower research II
LanguageData.T_FlowerII.description: Learn to grow purple flowers for honey.
LanguageData.T_FlowerIII.label: Flower research III
LanguageData.T_FlowerIII.description: Learn to grow honey flowers for honey.
